mapper.select: select op.id, op.quantity, p.price as price, p.product_name, s.second_category_name, pi.image,pi.product_id as productId, o.id as orderId, pi.is_thumbnail as isThumbnail from order_products_tb op left join order_tb o on o.id = op.order_id left join product_tb p on p.id = op.product_id left join second_category_tb s on p.second_category_id = s.id left join product_image_tb pi on p.id = pi.product_id where o.user_id = #{id} and pi.is_thumbnail = 1 and o.state = '장바구니' group by pi.is_thumbnail,op.product_id;

select o.created_at , ot.product_name ,p.product_feature, (select group_concat(concat(ot.product_name," * ",ot.quantity )) from order_products_tb ot where ot.order_id= o.id group by ot.order_id) as productName, pi.image, o.id, o.state, (select sum(opt.price * opt.quantity) from order_tb ot left join order_products_tb opt on opt.order_id = ot.id where ot.id= o.id group by ot.id ) as price from order_tb o left join order_products_tb ot on o.id = ot.order_id left join product_tb p on ot.product_id = p.id left join product_image_tb pi on p.id = pi.product_id where o.user_id = #{id} and o.state = '취소요청' or o.state = '결제완료' or o.state = '결제취소' group by o.id;
select o.id, o.created_at, o.user_id, op.product_name, op.price,o.cancel_date from order_tb o left join order_products_tb op on o.id = op.order_id;

select o.id as id, o.purchase_date, o.user_id, op.product_name, (select price*quantity from order_products_tb where order_id = o.id AND product_id = op.product_id) as price, p.tid, o.state, op.quantity from order_tb o left join order_products_tb op on o.id = op.order_id left join payment_tb p on o.id = p.order_id where o.id = #{id};
